txt.en: You have defeated a number of Isengard's forces who settled into the shadow of Núrzum's presence.\n\nWildermore is not yet safe, but the Orcs are not to call it home while its people still live.
Orcs have settled near this ice-spire where Núrzum once rested, letting their guard down as they huddle in the shelter of his icy shadow.
You have defeated a number of Isengard's forces who settled into the shadow of Núrzum's presence.\n\nWildermore is not yet safe, but the Orcs are not to call it home while its people still live.
Orcs have settled near this ice-spire where Núrzum once rested, letting their guard down as they huddle in the shelter of his icy shadow.
Orcs can be found at one of the ice-spires marking a spot where Núrzum rested.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs at the ice-spire.
